title: #КТО_ТЫ
overview: Russia, 2020. A mysterious programmer creates a Mechanism-a neural network that performs the functions of a personal consultant. Every citizen facing social injustice or legal difficulties can receive the advice of the Mechanism. How the fate of the heroes will develop is up to you.Nina, the daughter of a rich official, returns from London to Moscow to rescue a young blogger friend who is accused of extremism. Here Nina is confronted with the realities of the new Russia, its state system — and the rapper Roman, a simple guy from the Moscow region, a sexist and chauvinist, who also fights for the truth, but with completely opposite methods.Nina and Roman fall in love at first sight — but will their feelings stand the test of the adult and harsh reality of modern Russia, and will they overcome the conflict in their views?
